0.1.name: wordpress/qtranslate-slug-with-widget
0.1.description:
This plugin allows qTranslate users to have slug translation as well, a basic feature unexpectedly missing in the original plugin. Based on qTranslateslug code by by Cimatti Consulting, patched to have a new widget replacing qTranslate language selection. Tested with versions 2.5.7 and 2.5.9.

Plugin Homepage

http://www.3dolab.net/en/qtranslateslug-plugin-widget

What's new? version 0.6 (2012.05.08)

  • Bugfix in saving category fields (line 849)
  • Slug translation improved by codetavern & ilpiac

See the CHANGELOG for more information
